data.title: Jarod Bryant - Football
data.meta_description: Jarod Bryant (2) QB/SB  - At Navy: Was voted offensive team captain at the conclusion of spring practice by his teammates ... enters the fall listed second on the
data.text:
At Navy: Was voted offensive team captain at the conclusion of spring practice by his teammates ... enters the fall listed second on the depth chart at both quarterback and slot back .. cross trained at both positions in the spring ... led the Blue to a 14-0 victory over the Gold in the annual spring game ... did not see any time at slot back in the spring game ... rushed for 30 yards and a touchdown and completed all three of his pass atempts for 66 yards ... one of Navy's most athletic players ... offensive coordinator Ivin Jasper was a starter at slot back and the backup quarterback while at the University of Hawai'i ... has good speed, is shifty and is hard to tackle ... benches 335 pounds ... poised and able to be called upon in any situation ... has earned two varsity letters.

2007: Played in 10 games, including one start ... completed 17-of-31 pass attempts (54.8 percent) for 252 yards on the year ... rushed for 464 yards on 94 carries with five touchdowns during the season ... took over at quarterback during the final drive of the game at Rutgers ... ran three times for 33 yards, including a 21-yard run, and scored for his first-career touchdown against the Scarlet Knights ... against Ball State, he took over quarterback duties in the third quarter and played the remainder of the contest ... posted then career highs of 13 rushing attempts for 77 yards ... went 1-for-1 through the air for 13 yards ... came in during the fourth quarter and engineered a come-from-behind victory against Duke ... helped erase an 11-point, fourth quarter deficit by guiding the offense to 175 yards, two field goals and a touchdown in the final stanza ... rushed for 69 yards on 14 carries, including a 35-yard carry on the final drive of the game that helped set up the game-winning field goal ... caught a five-yard touchdown pass from slotback Bobby Doyle to pull the Mids within two with 3:49 remaining in the game ... tied the game at 43 with a two-point rushing conversion ... also connected on 1-of-3 pass attempts for 14 yards against the Blue Devils ... came in for an injured Kaheaku-Enhada in the second quarter against Wake Forest and played the remainder of the game ... ran the ball 16 times for 56 yards against the Demon Deacons ... broke free for a career-long 43-yard scamper during the opening drive of the third quarter ... through the air, he completed 4-of-9 pass attempts for 39 yards ... came in and produced from the third quarter on against Delaware ... completed 8-of-11 pass attempts for a career-high 126 yards ... 51 of those yards came on a completion to Zerbin Singleton in the fourth quarter, a career long ... with his legs, he ran nine times for 25 yards and a touchdown ... his one-yard sneak pulled the Mids within three in the fourth quarter ... played well at North Texas following an injury to Kaheaku-Enhada ... engineered four touchdown-scoring drive in six possessions while taking the snaps ... ran the ball nine times for 57 yards and a touchdown ... his rushing score came from six yards out and gave the Mids their first lead of the game on his first series ... also threw an incomplete pass in the fourth quarter ... made his first start of the year against Northern Illinois ... ran 27 times for 139 yards with a touchdown ... it was his first-career 100-yard performance ... threw for 60 yards on 3-of-6 passing against the Huskies ... in reserve duty against Army, he ran twice for seven yards and a touchdown ... ran once for one yard against Utah in the Poinsettia Bowl.

2006: Played in 11 games, starting one ... carried the ball 18 times for 86 yards and completed six of his 15 pass attempts for 42 yards ... served as Matt Harmon's holder on field goals and extra points ... saw significant action against Rutgers, running the ball twice for five yards and completing 2-of-10 passes for 20 yards ... went 2-for-2 for 18 yards through the air in the loss to Notre Dame ... saw first action at quarterback against UConn, running the ball once for three yards ... ran for a then-career-high 32 yards on just four carries in the win over Duke ... ran for 25 yards on four carries in the win over Eastern Michigan ... ran the ball twice for 16 yards against Temple ... ran the ball three times for five yards against Army ... earned his first-career start in the Meineke Car Care Bowl against Boston College ... completed both of his pass attempts for four yards. 2005: Carried the ball three times for 26 yards in Navy's 51-30 rout of Colorado State in the Poinsettia Bowl.
